title: Microsoft PowerPoint 2016 2013 2010 2007 Tips Tricks and Shortcuts: Presentations, Special Effects and Animations in 25 Mini-Lessons
features: Paperback versions are also available, including Color and NEW LARGE PRINT B&W Version! For 8 X 10 Large Print B&W Recommended Format, go directly to this link: http://a.co/b39NamfFor 7 X 10 Color Paperback, go directly to this link: http://a.co/7i5fBy1

25 Mini-Lessons PLUS Videos Packed with PowerPoint Tips, Tricks and ShortcutsBite-Sized Learning Modules to Help You Work Smarter, Save Time and Increase ProductivityPlus Links to 25 Companion Training Videos Create Your Presentations and Slideshows Easier, Smarter and Faster!Format Presentation Slides in a SnapLearn PowerPoint Tricks To Make You an Excel Expert Overnight!

*Part I. PowerPoint Basics: Creating a Simple Presentation, PowerPoint Templates, Simple and Fast Formatting, Copy/Paste Tricks, Format Painter, Opening, Saving, Closing and Printing*Part II. Working with the Slide Master*Part III. Working with Slides: Inserting, Deleting, Copying and Moving Slides*Part IV. Backgrounds, Objects, Images and Media*Part V. Slide Show Options: Electronic Pen, Laser Pointer, Highlighter and Presenter View*Part VI. Animation Station and Special Effects*Part VII. Extras: Speaker Notes, Handouts, Hyperlinks, File Conversion, Plus BONUS Tricks to Make You an PowerPoint Expert
description: From the Author

Amelia Griggs is an Instructional Designer and eLearning developer. She has a M.S. in Instructional Design and Technology from Philadelphia University, and a B.B.A in Computer Science from Temple University. In addition to designing and developing all kinds of educational materials, including instructional videos, Amelia also loves writing educational articles, fictional short stories and poetry. After collecting all kinds of tips, tricks and shortcuts while conducting Microsoft Office classroom training and online training, Amelia created a Microsoft Office How-To Series consisting of 3 books:
Microsoft Word Tips, Tricks and Shortcuts: 35 Mini-Lessons to Work Smarter, Save Time and Increase Productivity PLUS Training Videos
Microsoft Word Tips, Tricks and Shortcuts: 35 Mini-Lessons to Work Smarter, Save Time and Increase Productivity PLUS Training Videos
Microsoft Excel Tips, Tricks and Shortcuts: Learn Formulas, Functions and Formatting in 20 Mini-Lessons PLUS Training Videos
Microsoft Excel Tips, Tricks and Shortcuts: Learn Formulas, Functions and Formatting in 20 Mini-Lessons PLUS Training Videos
Microsoft PowerPoint Tips, Tricks and Shortcuts: Presentations, Special Effects and Animations in 25 Mini-Lessons PLUS Training Videos
Microsoft PowerPoint Tips, Tricks and Shortcuts: Presentations, Special Effects and Animations in 25 Mini-Lessons PLUS Training Videos
Amelia also has a children's series called "The Bella and Mia Adventure Series" consisting of rhyming verses with a recipe in the back of each book:
Silly Willy Apple Cake
Silly Willy Apple Cake
Squishy Wishy Meatballs
Squishy Wishy Meatballs
Snowflakes With Sugar
Snowflakes With Sugar
There is also a coloring activity book series, all inspired by her rhyming storybooks:
ABC Letter Tracing PLUS Coloring and Activity Fun! (Apple and Food themed, and inspired by Silly Willy Apple Cake)
ABC Letter Tracing PLUS Coloring and Activity Fun! (Apple and Food themed, and inspired by Silly Willy Apple Cake)
Counting and Math with Pasta and Meatballs PLUS Coloring and Activity Fun! (Inspired by Squishy Wishy Meatballs!)
Counting and Math with Pasta and Meatballs PLUS Coloring and Activity Fun! (Inspired by Squishy Wishy Meatballs!)

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/4ggqos2hf6db3ukd1p59ifr1ht._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Amelia Griggs', 'about': ["Amelia Griggs is the author of over a dozen books in 3 different genres including non-fiction technology, children's books, coloring and activity books, and a new series to help other authors learn more about the writing, publishing, and marketing process of being an author. Amelia is also a freelance Instructional Designer and eLearning developer. She enjoys researching, designing and developing all kinds of educational materials, writing instructional articles, blogging, and composing fictional short stories. She is currently working on educational books, how-to guides, and instructional YouTube videos. Amelia has always loved writing for as long as she could remember. She also loves writing short stories, rhymes, and poems, and who knows...there might even be a novel in her future.", 'She has a Bachelor of Business Administration with a Major in Computer Science and a Master of Science in Instructional Design and Technology.', "Amelia's Writing Corner Blog and Website: https://ameliaswritingcorner.com", 'YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/easylearningweb', 'Link Tree: https://linktr.ee/ameliagriggs', "To see all of Amelia's books:", 'Geo-Friendly Amazon Author Page: geni.us/authoramelia', 'Reach for the stars and be all you can be. :-)', 'May success, happiness, good health and prosperity be yours!', 'Happiness is doing what you love!']}
